mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,TOTAL_CNT ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIED_TIME FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIED_TIME ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo}-1)*10 + 1 AND (#{pageNo})*10

SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,TOTAL_CNT ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIED_TIME FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIED_TIME ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{param} ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN 1 AND 20
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD
SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,(SELECT COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
